Amend Article II, section A (pg 13) by adding:
Thoroughfare District (TD)
Amend Article all (beginning at P9 27) by adding:
Section J. Thoroughfare District (TD)
1.
Purpose: If is the purpose of the Thoroughfare District to regulate the use of
and adjacent to major thoroughfares, ie., US 17 By-Pass in the Town of Bolivia and its extra-
territorial jurisdiction in a menner that will promote commercial activities particularly those
suitable to highway traffic, enhance overall property values, and protect residential
neighborhoods and the general health safely and welfare of the community.
2.
Permitted Uses: All general uses permitted in Commercial District 3
3.
Buffer: Buffers are required on property in the Thoroughtare District which abuts
property in a residential district or property occupied by any pre-existing residential use. Unless
excluded elsewhere in this ordinance, applications for a building permit on such property shall be
accompanied by a pist in compliance with Article VI of this ordinance and which shows the visual
buffer. The buffer shall consist of one of the following:
a)
A compact evergreen hedge or other type of evergreen follage
screening Minimum height and width for such buffer shall be five fest when planted
b)
A combined fence and shrubbery screen. the latter facing the residential
use Minimum height and width for such buffer shall be five feet high; and four feet wide when
planted
a)
An earthern berm @ minimum of three feet high and a maximum of five
feet high. with & minimum of three feet high by by three feel wide evergreen foliage. In the
event the berm and shrub option is used, the maximum slope on the berm sides shall be no
greater than one foot 10 one foot
The visual buffer shall be inspected by the Town Official enforcing zoning ordinances.
4.
Lighting: The lighting in thoroughture District must be designed in
such a way that it will have minimal effect on adjoining property Outside lighting shall be
constructed so that it will shine only upon the premises and shall not be directed 50 that it shines
directly onto adjoining property. This is to be accomplished by the proper selection. placement
and height of the fixtures. Signs may be Eluminated in compliance with Article XI of this
ordinances.
ordinance. The lighting plan shall be approved by the Town Official enforcing zoning
